mapper.select: SELECT * FROM stu_stat_tb WHERE student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY to_date DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stu_stat_tb (student_id, status, from_date, to_date) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{status}, now(), #{toDate})
